title: Loans on Securities, Reporting Member Banks, Federal Reserve System for United States
notes:
Data Cover 101 Cities. In September 1934 The Form Of Reports Changed. Data Were Computed By Summing Loans To Brokers Outside New York City; Open Market Loans-Loans To Brokers In New York City; Loans To Others On Security. Data For June-December 1937 Were Published As Totals; Data For 1938 Were Computed From Weekly Figures. Source: Federal Reserve Board, Annual Reports, 1930, P. 98; 1933, P. 184; 1936, Pp. 154, 156, 160; 1937, P. 142; Following Years.

This NBER data series m14074 appears on the NBER website in Chapter 14 at http://www.nber.org/databases/macrohistory/contents/chapter14.html.

NBER Indicator: m14074
